dmca.title: Trademark Complaint from Verisign for beacongroupllc.com [454208] VeriSign Secured? S
dmca.body:
t

-----Original Message-----
From: Brand Abuse [mailto:brandabuse@verisign.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, November 07, 2006 5:40 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Trademark Complaint from Verisign for beacongroupllc.com
[454208] VeriSign Secured? Seal usage in your site
Subject: RE: Trademark Complaint from Verisign for beacongroupllc.com
[454208] VeriSign Secured? Seal usage in your site


Dear Web Host,

Please help us to forward this email to the Site's owner.

We noticed that the VeriSign Secured Seal has been removed from the
page:
http://www.beacongroupllc.com/. Please also remove the seal from all of
the Sub pages:

http://www.beacongroupllc.com/home/refer.htm
http://www.beacongroupllc.com/home/downloads.htm
http://www.beacongroupllc.com/home/about.htm
...... 
Also please notify us again when this issue is resolved thus we can
close the case.
 

Thanks & regards
Hanh Vu
VeriSign Fraud Detection Team
brandabuse@verisign.com
1-866-880-7025 (US) / 1-650-426-7025 (International)


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Tuesday, November 07, 2006 2:47 PM
To: Brand Abuse; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Trademark Complaint from Verisign for beacongroupllc.com
[454208]

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------
